title: The Crown of Russian Empire, Part One

sources.title: The Crown of Russian Empire, Part One
sources.description:
Second part is available on our channel: https://youtu.be/pjZISgiuBvI

The Elusive Avengers: https://youtu.be/Vl0uzTY0M9Y
The New Adventures of the Avengers: https://youtu.be/ZgOZELyW__U

Sequel of a legendary story about adventures of the «Elusive Avengers», young Soviet agents, who had victoriosly fought against enemies of the revolution during the civil war. The heroes of the film Ksanka, Valerka, Danyaka and Yashka receive a new mission - disrupt the insidious plans of the white emigrants and return the stolen historical relic - the crown of Russian Empire…

Year of production: 1971

Director: Keosayan Edmond
Writers: Keosayan Edmond, Chervinsky Alexander
Composer: Frenkel Yan
Operator: Ardabyevsky Mikhail
Production designer: Shengeliya Levan, Agoyan Sovet

Cast: Mikhail Metelkin, Victor Kosykh, Vassily Vassillyev, Rolan Bykov, Valentina Kurdyukova, Ivan Pereverzev, Armen Dzhigarkanyan, Vladimir Ivashov, Vladislav Strzhelchik, Arkadiy Tolbuzin, Yefim Kopelyan, Ludmila Gurchenko, Andrey Fait, Grigoriy Shpigel, Artem Koropetyan
